title: End of the Road

description: Episode of Series "Acquaintance Rape". This film dramatises the occurrence of sexual assault between teenage acquaintances through an episode involving a teenage girl, who accepts a ride offered by an acquaintance after her car breaks down. This film points out various factors which contribute to the driver's sexual assault, and emphasises the need for young people to understand their own sexual values and those of others. Written by Nancy Graham and Christina Crowley
